ohoma yanakota koti sarata yaluwo godak set una,miniha hamadama chayinis wala bonawa, tika dawasak yanakota migamuwe paththe karoke walatath yanna gaththalu,sallikaraya wenna issallath miniha buru polawal wala unne gadol rassawen hoyapu salli walin,dan miniha supiri buru polawal walata yanna gaththa,40 panapu pora unata dan salli thiyanawa ne,,minihata hamathanama ganu inna gaththa,issara mati nagena unnu sara diha baluwewath nathi ganu sarage passen dan eka digata,, mati nagena unnu sarage ganith alu gasa dala hada wada wela unna,, ee wenakota ithin sarage wate unnu aluth yaluwoth sara nathi welawata geta ringuwalu, koti sara yuwala supiri jiwithayak genichcha thamange daruwanuth ekka, denna samagiyen samadanen sathutin dennage jiwithe genichcha,sarage wate unnu ganu kipa denekma gewal dorawal hadagena thibuna ,ee wagema thama ganita lanunu minissuth yahamin salli kadagena thibuna. 2012 wenakota koti sara joduwa aaye mati godata watila, moko une sara kiyala ahanakota joduwa dena uththare hoda hinawak ehema dala rupiyal 10 k karapu keliya oya mada kiyanawalu, dennage hithe kisima dukak nalu denna samayen samadanen aaye mati gode.
